data.tags: Amazon Augmented AI, Amazon SageMaker, Artificial Intelligence
data.description: When machine learning (ML) is deployed in production, monitoring the model is important for maintaining the quality of predictions. Although the statistical properties of the training data are known in advance, real-life data can gradually deviate over time and impact the prediction results of your model, a phenomenon known as data drift.
